sentence.text: Hypomorphic IKBKG mutations in males are typically associated with anhidrotic ectodermal dysplasia with immunodeficiency (positive regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity-ID).

entity.text: positive regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity

sentence.text: As rare polymorphisms have been described in cellular response to DNA damage stimulus and polygenic inheritance remains an option in the presented case, this study emphasizes the need for thorough functional and genetic evaluation when encountering and interpreting suspected disease-causing NEMO-ID variants

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus
